description: A young, silver-furred wolf with glowing blue eyes that hunts under the light of the moon. The Moonfang Pup is known for its agility and keen senses, making it a formidable opponent despite its size.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: The Moonfang Pup has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+2) piercing damage.
